dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
LÃ©on Bottou
Yoshua Bengio
Patrick Haffner
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A dataset of fashion items, consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images, each of size 28x28 pixels. It serves as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: FMNIST (Fashion-MNIST)

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is commonly used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: G. Cohen
S. Afshar
J. Tapson
A. van Schaik
dcterms:description: An extension of the MNIST dataset to include handwritten letters. It consists of 814,255 characters for training and 139,000 characters for testing.
dcterms:title: EMNIST
